point_in_rectangle: When using this function, you define a rectangular area and GameMaker Studio 2 will work out whether the given point falls within its bounds or not. If the point falls within the defined rectangle the function will return <tt>true</tt> otherwise the function will return <tt>false</tt>.
point_in_rectangle(px, py, x1, y1, x2, y2);
The x coordinate of the point to check.
The y coordinate of the point to check.
The x coordinate of the left side of the rectangle to check.
The y coordinate of the top side of the rectangle to check.
The x coordinate of the right side of the rectangle to check.
The y coordinate of the bottom side of the rectangle to check.
